objects.text:
• IR Reflection & Nano Technology
• Thermal Comfort Without AC
• Elastomeric & Crack Free
• Energy Conservation

product_details.name: PANACHE Cool Tops Eco I R Reflective Cool Roof Coating –Thermal Comfort Without Ac! Cool Top Eco - Cool, Elastomeric & Crack Free Roof Coating 5 Kg Bucket
product_details.description: Cooler Roofs mean longer life of roofs with crack prevention & contribution to indoor cooling. Cool Tops Eco is a single component elastomeric ready to use emulsion with high reflectivity & high emissivity. Cool Top Eco has SRI of 102. It is self-priming and can be applied directly to substrate with brush/roller & spray. Two to three coats of Cool Top Eco gives temperature difference on the substrate exposed to solar radiations. Cool Top Eco amends roof and provides energy conservation with temperature stability. It's being eco-friendly, almost nil VOC adds to environment benefits. Different pastel color shades can also be achieved with reflective pigments.

banner_details:
This banner features a modern grid-based layout with a clean and professional design. The background uses a subtle quadrant grid split with light cyan tones and white sections that give structure. A circular motif and diagonally aligned lines on the top right add dynamic interest. 

The left third of the banner contains three primary text layers: a small tagline at the top (**tagline**), a bold two-line heading conveying product name (**heading**), and a subtext for product type (**subheading**). Below, a bulleted feature list (**description**) highlights product benefits. A bold price text (**price**) is followed by a call-to-action button made with a rectangle (**cta_background**) and central label (**cta**).

The product image (**product_image**) is prominently placed on the right, giving balance. Additional design accents like dotted grid and light strokes reinforce alignment.

**Color Palette:**
- Teal: #00A99D
- Dark Teal: #005F56
- Charcoal: #333333
- Gray: #666666
- Cyan Tint: #E0F5F2
- White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image utilizes a clean, modern color palette, emphasizing freshness and eco-friendliness, ideal for an advertisement banner. The dominant teal green (#009688) conveys coolness and environmental consciousness, while the white (#FFFFFF) background enhances readability and provides a crisp contrast. Navy blue (#0D2046) is used for brand text, adding professionalism and trust. A touch of lime green (#A5CD39) in the logo leaf introduces a natural, eco-friendly tone. These colors are well-blended with sharp contrasts—white text on teal, and navy text on white. This palette keeps the product visually striking, fresh, and aligned with its cooling, sustainable message.
